00002 #define MANGLE_SOUND_SOURCE_SPLICE_H
00003 
00004 #include "../source.hpp"
00005 #include <stdexcept>
00006 #include <string>
00007 #include <list>
00008 #include <assert.h>
00009 
00010 namespace Mangle
00011 {
00012   namespace Sound
00013   {
00014     class SourceSplicer : public SampleSourceLoader
00015     {
00016       struct SourceType
00017       {
00018         std::string type;
00019         SampleSourceLoaderPtr loader;
00020       };
00021 
00022       typedef std::list<SourceType> TypeList;
00023       TypeList list;
00024       SampleSourceLoaderPtr catchAll;
00025 
00026       static bool isMatch(char a, char b)
00027       {
00028         if(a >= 'A' && a <= 'Z')
00029           a += 'a' - 'A';
00030         if(b >= 'A' && b <= 'Z')
00031           b += 'a' - 'A';
00032         return a == b;
00033       }
00034 
00035     public:
00036       SourceSplicer()
00037       {
00038         canLoadStream = false;
00039         canLoadFile = true;
00040       }
00041 
00042       void add(const std::string &type, SampleSourceLoaderPtr fact)
00043       {
00044         SourceType tp;
00045         tp.type = type;
00046         tp.loader = fact;
00047         list.push_back(tp);
00048       }
00049 
00050       void setDefault(SampleSourceLoaderPtr def)
00051       {
00052         catchAll = def;
00053       }
00054 
00055       SampleSourcePtr load(const std::string &file)
00056       {
00057         // Search the list for this file type.
00058         for(TypeList::iterator it = list.begin();
00059             it != list.end(); it++)
00060           {
00061             const std::string &t = it->type;
00062 
00063             int diff = file.size() - t.size();
00064             if(diff < 0) continue;
00065 
00066             bool match = true;
00067             for(unsigned i=0; i<t.size(); i++)
00068               if(!isMatch(t[i], file[i+diff]))
00069                 {
00070                   match = false;
00071                   break;
00072                 }
00073 
00074             // Got something! We're done.
00075             if(match)
00076               return it->loader->load(file);
00077           }
00078         // If not found, use the catch-all
00079         if(catchAll)
00080           return catchAll->load(file);
00081 
00082         throw std::runtime_error("No handler for sound file " + file);
00083       }
00084 
00085       SampleSourcePtr load(Stream::StreamPtr input) { assert(0); }
00086     };
00087   }
00088 }
00089 
00090 #endif
